title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: The advice you dish today could be right on the money. However, its usefulness could be determined by its delivery. A bland approach is likely to fall flat; but if youre too dramatic, your words might be written off as over the top. The sweet spot is no doubt found in being sensitive to where your audience is coming from, yet serious enough to communicate unvarnished truth. Whispers and megaphones are unnecessarily extreme measures. Your message has the best chance of breaking through when you tell it like it is in practical terms. Honesty demands effort. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
